name: Maze Escape (Gorglomux)
description:
Add tiles to the evergrowing maze to help the minotaur find the exit stairs !

You can choose between 3 tiles for each level (located in the top left), but sometimes you don't have to use them all !

A 30-level puzzle made for the Summer Slow Jam - July 2019 !

Doesn't work and Edge and Safari, and takes some time to load!
